entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as taking a large dose of Polyjuice Potion and becoming the double of a redheaded Muggle boy from Ottery St. Catchpole. He is also referred to as 'Cousin Barny'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as standing outside the marquee with Harry, Fred, and George.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is described as stealing hairs from a redheaded Muggle boy using a Summoning Charm to help Harry disguise himself.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as standing outside the marquee with Harry, Ron, and Fred.

entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: Polyjuice Potion is described as a magical potion that allows Harry to disguise himself as another person.

entities.name: ottery st. catchpole
entities.description: Ottery St. Catchpole is mentioned as the village where the redheaded Muggle boy lives from whom Fred stole hairs to help Harry disguise himself.

entities.name: marquee
entities.description: The marquee is described as a large white structure in the orchard where the wedding guests are arriving.

entities.name: orchard
entities.description: The orchard is mentioned as the location of the marquee and the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: wedding guests
entities.description: The wedding guests are mentioned as arriving at the marquee, but their identities are not specified.

entities.name: waiters
entities.description: A host of white-robed waiters is described as having arrived an hour earlier to help with the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: band
entities.description: A golden jacketed band is mentioned as arriving along with the waiters to provide music for the wedding ceremony.
